name: Jammo
description:
This was an individual project to learn about game development. The game is a third person shooter with some platforming. There is some mismatching art styles. Some of the animations look off. But you can play it... or don't, whatever.

If you do play it. There are several themed levels to play through with enemies to combat and platforms to traverse. As you progress through the levels, you will be able to access an array of guns and abilities to help through the game.
